an7.21:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati sarandade cetiye.
an7.21:1.3: Atha kho sambahula licchavi yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho te licchavi bhagava etadavoca:
an7.21:1.5: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an7.21:1.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te licchavi bhagavato paccassosum.
an7.21:2.2: Yavakivanca, licchavi, vajji abhinham sannipata bhavissanti sannipatabahula;
an7.21:2.3: vuddhiyeva, licchavi, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.21:3.1: Yavakivanca, licchavi, vajji samagga sannipatissanti, samagga vutthahissanti, samagga vajjikaraniyani karissanti;
an7.21:3.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavi, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.21:4.1: Yavakivanca, licchavi, vajji apannattam na pannapessanti, pannattam na samucchindissanti, yathapannatte porane vajjidhamme samadaya vattissanti;
an7.21:4.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavi, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.21:5.1: Yavakivanca, licchavi, vajji ye te vajjinam vajjimahallaka te sakkarissanti garum karissanti manessanti pujessanti, tesanca sotabbam mannissanti;
an7.21:5.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavi, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.21:6.1: Yavakivanca, licchavi, vajji ya ta kulitthiyo kulakumariyo ta na okassa pasayha vasessanti;
an7.21:6.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavi, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.21:7.1: Yavakivanca, licchavi, vajji yani tani vajjinam vajjicetiyani abbhantarani ceva bahirani ca tani sakkarissanti garum karissanti manessanti pujessanti, tesanca dinnapubbam katapubbam dhammikam balim no parihapessanti;
an7.21:7.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavi, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.21:8.1: Yavakivanca, licchavi, vajjinam arahantesu dhammika rakkhavaranagutti susamvihita bhavissati:
an7.21:8.2: ‘kinti anagata ca arahanto vijitam agaccheyyum, agata ca arahanto vijite phasum vihareyyun’ti;
an7.21:8.3: vuddhiyeva, licchavi, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.21:9.1: Yavakivanca, licchavi, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma vajjisu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu vajji sandississanti;
an7.21:9.2: vuddhiyeva, licchavi, vajjinam patikankha, no parihani”ti.
